modName: NEW Uthgerd the unbroken COOL BEAUTIFUL and ESSENTIAL
summary:
This is one of the mods i have made with NPC Editor.
Este es uno de los mods que he hecho con NPC Editor.
I dont use NPC EDITOR so much
descriptionHtml:
Hi! Im very new here on nexus and skyrim,this is one of my first mods i\'ve made.
Well i didn\'t liked the look of Uthgerd...so i found this site and then i take a look to face and hair
mods,then i maked this:

===================================================
======================================================
SOMETHING IMPORTANT: 
THE OLD UTHGERD CAN DIE...BUT NOW SHE\'S ESSENTIAL NPC SO WHEN IS ABOUT TO DIE,SHE FALLS TO HER KNEES TO RESTORE HEALTH! SO DON\'T WORRY ABOUT HER :)
=====================================================
===================================================

Required files:
=================================
SKYRIM 1.6.89.0.6
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]Apachi Hair[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2464]Bright Eyes[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7887]Pretty Face[/url]
==========================================================


=======
Optional:
if you want:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6348]Frosmourne Sword and King Lich armor[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16248]Pretty Sit Idles[/url]
(BUT WHEN YOU MEET HER,SHE IS USING DAEDRIC ARMOR AND 2H SWORD,NOT THE
FROSTMOURNE SWORD)
================

Now she uses Daedric armor and a 2h sword with cool looking!
As you see im not the owner of these files,give them the credit,because they deserve it :D

Installation:

Using NEXUS MOD MANAGER: Well is very easy,click \"ADD MOD FROM FILE\",then search the file and then install it,its so easy!

Manual installation: Search where you have installed Skyrim(mine is C:\\Archivos de programa\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim) then put the .esp and .bsp in the Data folder

Si hablas espa√±ol como yo lee el Readme-Leeme en el archivo que dice lo mismo que aqui xD
Aunque supongo que dominas el ingles si andas por estas paginas jaja
author: Waldoman
